title: Sir Thomas More
description: "Sir Thomas More" is especially valuable for the light it throws on the doctrinal issues that were at the center of the Reformation. This is a detailed, well-researched and thouroughly conventional biography of the life of Thomas More. To put it succintly, this biography is more a discussion of ideas than of events of that time, since More was a rather second-rate political figure.
author: Anthony Munday
